00030 #ifndef SC_OBJECT_MANAGER_H
00031 #define SC_OBJECT_MANAGER_H
00032 
00033 #include <map>
00034 #include <vector>
00035 
00036 namespace sc_core {
00037 
00038 class sc_event;
00039 class sc_object;
00040 class sc_module_name;
00041 
00042 
00043 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 //  CLASS : sc_object_manager
00045 //
00046 //  Manager of objects.
00047 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00048 
00049 class sc_object_manager
00050 {
00051     friend class sc_event;
00052     friend class sc_object;
00053     friend class sc_simcontext;
00054 
00055 protected:
00056     enum sc_name_origin
00057     {
00058         SC_NAME_NONE,
00059         SC_NAME_OBJECT,
00060         SC_NAME_EVENT,
00061         SC_NAME_EXTERNAL
00062     };
00063 
00064     struct table_entry
00065     {
00066         table_entry() : m_element_p(NULL), m_name_origin(SC_NAME_NONE) {}
00067 
00068             void*          m_element_p; // can be an sc_object or an sc_event
00069         sc_name_origin m_name_origin;
00070     };
00071 
00072 public:
00073     typedef std::map<std::string,table_entry> instance_table_t;
00074     typedef std::vector<sc_object*>           object_vector_t;
00075 
00076     sc_object_manager();
00077     ~sc_object_manager();
00078 
00079     bool name_exists(const std::string& name);
00080     const char* get_name(const std::string& name);
00081 
00082     sc_event* find_event(const char* name);
00083 
00084     sc_object* find_object(const char* name);
00085     sc_object* first_object();
00086     sc_object* next_object();
00087 
00088     void hierarchy_push(sc_object* mdl);
00089     sc_object* hierarchy_pop();
00090     sc_object* hierarchy_curr();
00091     int hierarchy_size();
00092 
00093     void push_module_name(sc_module_name* mod_name);
00094     sc_module_name* pop_module_name();
00095     sc_module_name* top_of_module_name_stack();
00096 
00097 
00098 private:
00099     std::string create_name( const char* leaf_name );
00100     void insert_event(const std::string& name, sc_event* obj);
00101     void insert_object(const std::string& name, sc_object* obj);
00102     bool insert_external_name(const std::string& name);
00103     void remove_event(const std::string& name);
00104     void remove_object(const std::string& name);
00105     bool remove_external_name(const std::string& name);
00106 
00107 private:
00108 
00109     instance_table_t::iterator m_event_it;          // event instance iterator.
00110     bool                       m_event_walk_ok;     // true if can walk events.
00111     instance_table_t           m_instance_table;    // table of instances.
00112     sc_module_name*            m_module_name_stack; // sc_module_name stack.
00113     instance_table_t::iterator m_object_it;         // object instance iterator.
00114     object_vector_t            m_object_stack;      // sc_object stack.
00115     bool                       m_object_walk_ok;    // true if can walk objects.
00116 };
00117 
00118 } // namespace sc_core
